header_text: You're having dinner at a nice restaurant with some friends you haven't seen in a while. In the middle of dinner, your arms start moving uncontrollably, and your friends all turn and look at you. Your friends think having dinner with you is nice.

elements.text: You're having dinner at a nice restaurant with some friends you haven't seen in a while. In the middle of dinner, your tremor starts to worsen, and your friends all turn and look at you. Your friends think having dinner with you is...

elements.name: You're having dinner at a nice restaurant with some friends you haven't seen in a while. In the middle of dinner, your arms start moving uncontrollably, and your friends all turn and look at you. Your friends think having dinner with you is nice.  _Early/Mid-Stage Symptoms_puzzle1
elements.incorrect_feedback: Whoops! That doesn't look right. Please wait a moment and try again.
